items.text: 夜景が綺麗過ぎます♪
Magnificent view. Pricey but the food is at least delightable.
Solid meal. Suckling pig was excellent.
Food, presentation, ambience and service were all excellent! Can't find any fault with it during a busy lunch time 😄!
Food is average and service  shabby. No big shakes.
Try the hokkien mee
Столик нужно бронировать заранее с видом на город. Кухня отличная, пробовали лобстера и рыбку, все очень вкусно и сытно. На десерт кушали яблочный тарт- пальчики оближешь. Минус - дорого.
Lovely views, fantastic food and thoughtful service. What else can you ask for? Loved the fried encrusted egg and seared Scottish salmon was delicious with the surprising cauliflower textures.
Great breakfast and laksa.
Great view. @simontancy
Franco-Asian cuisine by top chef Justin Quek at the Marina Bay Sands Hotel. More about Singapore in the digital LH Magazin www.lufthansa.com/magazin.
Come before sunset. Have a drink. Try Justin's dinner set. Best of his best.
Yummy beef noodles - A must try.   Beef consommé.  Foiegras dumplings!!!
Great place to enjoy drink with the view to Marina Bay or to have a networking event/corporate party! Stylish, good music/service! Enjoy!
The signature foie gras xiao long bao is well above average, though without any wow factor. A fine blend of Chinese and French cuisine. And of course, splendid view and ambience
It was an awesome place to experienced the city view...
Relación calidad precio muy descompesado. Solicita mesa al lado de la terraza, sino te la dan dentro y pierde todo su encanto. Aconsejable el club Cé La Vi a la otra punta del Hotel.
Lunch still has the great view and you can get a 3 course meal for $55
Eat in the sky
Много русских, и если это чиновники так осваивают бюджет - надеюсь они подавятся... ))
Очень хорошее обслуживание и вкусная кухня
GUESTじゃなくても入れます！
Angus sirloin!..mamamiaaaa...
The food was pretty good.. Tried the foie gras Xiao long bao which was interesting.. The Angus sirloin was divine
Place still sucks. The view is the only thing it has going for it.
Amazing food and amazing view😍 don't miss out on the black cod!
The food is great but the service is not that good at all!!!
They serve one of the best smoked bacon for breakfast buffet.
Try the Seared Foie Gras
Lunchie....
The highest Eggs Benedict in Singapore. 57 floors high.
Great view, but the food is really horrible and the wine are very pricey. Am amazed that some reviewer actually rate the food as good.
Amazing views, amazing food. The service was excellent
This is my must go to place when I have visitors for cocktails on the balcony and the must see view of Singapore! Justin Quek is so lovely too when he is around!
Love the view. It a wonderful experience to hav a breakfast here. Pricey but worth it. A wonderful start in d morning
Last nite....
Nice view, service Singaporean style...
Scenic views of Singapore skyline
service is mediocre, food is lousy, prices are ridiculous. a great place to bring people if you want to show you have plenty money and no taste. p.s. don't bother bringing your own cakes
Scenic view, music
Nice view here :)
Afternoon tea

The view is simply magnificent covering 180 degrees. The food is of very high class with mix breeds of Asian and French cuisine that challenges tradition. This restaurant has the most amazing setting!
Fantastic view of Singapore! If you want the freshest Singapore Sling, do not order here. Order from Rise Restaurant instead which is on the ground floor of the hotel.
Try the Bah Ku Teh With Pork Ravioli
The local asian-inspired bits are interesting: piña cruz colada, mango tango (with pamplemousse), & the sakura chix rice. I had the laksa.
Love the oysters and the outdoor sitting!
What a view, what a breakfast!
Excellent service. Go for the Xiao Long Bao with foie gras starter!
That view! Not so impressed with the food.
One of the best view in Singapore.
Great view, but extremely average service for the price you pay. Much better value elsewhere. Food OK, but again, not worth the money.
Get the table outside the restaurant for the best view.
Mellow service, good food, extraordinary view.
Fine food and awesome ambience
Sakura Fried Chicken yes, chicken curry asian salad no
Service is not good at all. Asked for second cup of coffee 3x. Tomorrow back to CLub Lounge far better selection and service.
الفيو خرافي ،، في أحلى فندق في سنغافورة ،، ما أتذكر جودة الأكل صراحة .. What a view
If it rains, you'll wait for the crews to settle the tables outside.

Nice view, food is not amazing. Had the JQ Prestige lunch menu. The ceviche and scallop dishes were good, but wagyu beef and pork belly were too greasy. Dessert wasn't great either. Nice Riesling tho.
Great restaurant with excellent service and fantastic food!
Excelente comida y grandes vistas!
makan...jalan2...cuci mata
God the view is so Awesome!!! a perfect place to start days in 2011 with optimistic from top of 57 levels!!
If u want breakfast with a view this is it... And if u are alone it's ok u can still get a window sit. Eggs Benedict. And staff will go out of their way to find what u want even if they don't have it
Foie Gras dumplings
Romantic setting, gorgeous view... What else is there to say but go out & experience it for yourself...😍💗🎉
Was here for the High Tea.  Disappointing... mushroom soup lukewarm.  Croissant is soft and not crisp.  Nothing special. Air conditioning not cold.
Extremely unattentive service.
Great view, bad acoustics, too cold and mediocre food for the price. Highly recommend the love scallop salad though.
Beat view from the balcony, good Martini
В бассейн вас не пустят а вот выпить кофе или коктейль с панорамным видом - легко. На носу sky bar но там другой вид и на смотровую без билета (20$) не пускают. Хотя если сильно попросить то можно)))
Top level of the hotel.
Замечательный ресторан с прекрасным видом и панорамной площадкой. Мы взяли гастрономический сет и просто по меню, все было очень вкусно, потрясающее обходительное и дружелюбное обслуживание. Дорого
美しい夜景が望めます。
Justin Quek first served his lobster hokkien mee 14 years ago when a tycoon patronised his restaurant. Now you can have its gourmet-ified version for $43.
don't waste your time. mediocre service, sub-standard food, completely overpriced
One of the dinner set menu Canadian Halibut
Food and service is amazing.
The roast sucking pig is TO DIE FOR. Perfect thin crispy skin, almost like a flaky pastry, sandwiches a layer of fat with soft succulent meat, the size of a very large fist. We'll worth another trip!
Service seems to have improved. Kept refilling my drink before I had finished half of it.
Breathtaking view
Awesome: Awesome views of the city. Awesome food. Awesome service.
Great food and service
Просто поднимаетесь с кормы марины на 57 этаж, заходите в Sky, в лево - ресторан ( минимум 40$ мин заказ с человека). В право тот же ресторан но там можно курить и достаточно купить кофе за 7$.
Amazing view from here!
Incredible views out over Singapore, especially at night.
Spectacular views from Sky level 57
